oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Duncan Hotel Lobby, Nashville, Tennessee, circa 1900s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A postcard with a view of the interior of the Duncan Hotel Lobby, advertised for its “home-like, true hospitality, L. F. Bradshaw, Mgr. Director.” The Duncan Hotel was located in downtown Nashville, Tennessee on the southeast corner of Fourth Avenue, North, and Cedar (Charlotte) Street. Forms part of the Ridley Wills II Nashville Postcards Collection. 1 postcard.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Wills, Ridley, 1934-
Duncan Hotel (Nashville, Tenn.)
